definition: "to obtain qi", the sensation of electrical tingling, numbness, soreness etc at the meridian where accupuncture needle is inserted
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: There are also some supplementary manipulations to increase the needling sensations.
sentences.chinese: 另有一些輔助手法用以加強得氣的感覺。

sentences.english: She had no puff left after climbing the hill.
sentences.chinese: 她爬上山後累得氣也喘不過來了。

sentences.english: He put too much air into the balloon and .
sentences.chinese: 他往氣球中充得氣太多，結果爆了。

sentences.english: Objective To study physiological foundation of acupuncture Deqi.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討鍼灸“得氣”的生理基礎。

definition: unconsciously
slow in one's reactions/sluggish (in movement or thought)
intention/motive/state of mind/ambition/aspiration/heart 氣|气[qi4] (TCM)
thus and so/such and such
lit. heart distracted, thoughts in turmoil (idiom); distraught with anxiety
not in good condition/wrong/fishy
to drift without a resting place (idiom)/roving/errant/vagrant/erratic
hot flush
anger/internal heat (TCM)
noisy/raucous/to shout and scream
everything steady and stable (idiom); overcautious and unimaginary
lone flower admiring itself (idiom); narcissism/self-love
want to stop but can't (idiom)/to be unable to stop oneself/to feel an urge to continue
to play tricks on/to make fun of/to tease
overcast (weather)/cloudy/shady/Yin (the negative principle of Yin and Yang)/negative (electric.)/feminine/moon/implicit/hidden/genitalia
surname Yin
frivolous/careless/giddy
